item.title: Horse Study
item.description: Horse Study Once in a while you forget what an animal actually looks like (their legs bend how?!) so you do a quick sketch and time yourself as a reminder.

item.title: Donovan In A Stable
item.description: Donovan In A Stable Donovan is a retired race-horse we meet at a rescue. Here he was waiting to go out to the pasture on a frigid morning.
